original_text: People wrote down everything else that Solomon did while he ruled as king, from the beginning to the end. The prophet Nathan wrote them down in his book. The prophet Ahijah who came from Shiloh also wrote them down. The prophet Iddo also wrote about them in his book of the visions that he saw about Nebat's son Jeroboam.
korean_text: 이 외에 솔로몬의 시종 행적은 선지자 나단의 글과 실로 사람 아히야의 예언과 선견자 잇도의 묵시 책 곧 잇도가 느밧의 아들 여로보암에 대하여 쓴 책에 기록되지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: People wrote down everything else that Solomon did
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 솔로몬이 한 다른 모든 일을 기록했습니다

sentences.original_text: from the beginning to the end
The prophet Nathan wrote them down in his book
sentences.korean_translation: 선지자 나단은 그것들을 자신의 책에 기록했습니다

sentences.original_text: The prophet Ahijah who came from Shiloh
The prophet Iddo also wrote about them
in his book of the visions
